chapter.text: 75|1|Watashi wa, fukkatsu no hi ni oite chikau.
75|2|Mata, jiseki suru tamashī ni oite chikau.
75|3|Ningen wa, ware ga kare no hone o atsume rarenai to kangaeru no ka.
75|4|Iya, ware wa kare no yubisaki (no hone) made soroeru koto ga dekiru nodearu.
75|5|Daga ningen wa, kare no gozen (no seikatsu) ni oite mo, tsumiwookasu koto o nozomu.
75|6|Kare wa,`fukkatsu no hi wa itsuka.' To tou.
75|7|Tsuini megakuramu-ji,
75|8|tsuki wa 蝕 Keri,
75|9|taiyō to tsuki wa awase rareru.
75|10|Sonohi ningen wa,`doko ni hinan shiyou ka.' To iu.
75|11|Danjite yoke rarenai nodearu.
75|12|Anata no omo no omoto ga, sonohi sadame no sumaidearu.
75|13|Sonohi (subete no) ningen wa, sudeni itta koto to,-go ni nokoshita koto ni tsuite kaku-ge rarerudearou.
75|14|Iya ningen wa, jibun jishin ni taishi shōnindearu.
75|15|Tatoe kare ga, iroiro benkai shite mo.
75|16|Kono (kuruān o saisoku suru tame ni) anata no shita o isogashi ku ugokashite wa naranai.
75|17|Sore o atsume, sore o yoma seru no wa, ware no shigotodearu.
75|18|Sorede ware ga sore o yonda toki, sono dokuju ni shitagae.
75|19|Sarani sore o tokiakasu no mo, hontōni ware no shigotodearu.
75|20|Iya, anata gata wa (hate nai) ukiyo o aishite,
75|21|raise o tōkan ni suru.
75|22|Sonohi, aru-sha-tachi no kao wa kagayaki,
75|23|kare-ra no omo o, aogi miru.
75|24|Mata sonohi, aru-sha-tachi no kao wa kuraku,
75|25|sebone o kudaku hodo no dai sainan ga, kare-ra ni furikakaru koto o shirudearou.
75|26|Iya,(tamashī ga) nodomoto ni todoku toki,
75|27|iwa reyou. `Dareka, noroi ga dekiru ka.'
75|28|Kare wa ribetsu (no toki)dearu koto o satorudearou.
75|29|Hitotsu no ashi wa tahō no ashi ni karamari,
75|30|sonohi kare wa, omo ni karitate rareru.
75|31|Kare wa shinri o ukeirezu, mata reihai mo bō-ge nakatta,
75|32|kaette (Mari) o kyogi to shi, somuki sari,
75|33|omoi agatte kazoku no moto ni omomuita.
75|34|Anata (tashinkyō to) ni wazawai are,(hontōni) wazawai naru ka na.
75|35|Kasanete iu. Anata ni wazawai are,(hontōni) wazawai naru ka na.
75|36|Ningen wa,(mokuteki mo naku) sono mama de hōnin sa reru to omou no ka.
75|37|Motomoto kare wa shashutsu sa reta, itteki no seiekide wa nakatta ka.
75|38|Sore kara hitokatamari no chi to nari, sarani arrā ga,(kinsei ni) katachidzukuri,
75|39|kare wa, ningen o otome no ryōsei ni nasa reta node wa nakatta ka.
75|40|Sore demo kare ni wa, shisha o yomigaera seru o-ryoku ga nai to suru no ka.
